entry.title: $2450 // ***OPEN HOUSE SAT/SUN*** $2450 Beautiful 1 bed Duplex on UWS next to
entry.content:
***OPEN HOUSE SATURDAY AND SUNDAY BY APPOINTMENT ONLY***

1 bed duplex apt available on the upper west side on a beautiful historically protected street right by central park and a block away from the Museum of Natural History. Great location, and 2 minutes to 1/2/3/B/C subway lines, fairway supermarket down the street, as well as citarella and other great eateries and gourmet grocers.

The building is a well maintained quiet building, with Laundry in basement, large living room and bathroom upstairs, with a big bedroom downstairs. This is ground floor apt in a walk up. This is a Sep 1st lease start date, this apt is being leased directly through the landlord and current tenant. We love our apt but are leaving NYC due to job relocation, there is no broker fee or brokers involved however a small fee of $450 to be paid to the landlord.

Pls contact me to set up an apt to view this apt this weekend, we will show all weekend. Thank you!

entry.title: $2200 // Classic beautiful 1 bedroom apartment
entry.content:
Classic 1 bedroom with hardwood floors, exposed brick, nice closet space, and windows in every room. Great location right off Broadway steps to the train, restaurants, nightlife, and just a few minutes to Columbia University. Photos are from a similar unit in the building.

Pets upon approval!
Heat and hot water included

Exposed Brick
High Ceilings
Hardwood Floors
Natural Light in Living Area
Laundry in building

Text 212.#4,7,0;8:8:30 to schedule a viewing! Thanks! :)
